pr_title: Add support for all create team parameters

timeline.message: Add support for all create team parameters

timeline.author: bitwiseman
bitwiseman

replies.bodyText:
agree, changed to update.
I didn't like the name but I followed the other method for consistency in the class
replies.author: timja

replies.bodyText: Glad you agree. But leave this for now. I don't want to do this unevenly (some update some set).  😄
replies.author: bitwiseman

timeline.bodyText: I think the other createTeam methods should be marked as @Deprecated.  Do you agree?
timeline.author: bitwiseman
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: Yes, wanted your input on it first before I did it, done.
replies.author: timja

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java b/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java
index a81c13ee2..38abd0acd 100644
--- a/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java
+++ b/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java

@@ -450,7 +452,9 @@ public class GHOrganization extends GHPerson {
      * @return the gh team
      * @throws IOException
      *             the io exception
+     * @deprecated Use {@link #createTeam(String)} that uses a builder pattern to let you control every aspect.
      */
+    @Deprecated
     public GHTeam createTeam(String name, GHRepository... repositories) throws IOException {
         return createTeam(name, Arrays.asList(repositories));
     }

timeline.bodyText: Add a link to the github api documentation for create team

replies.bodyText:
I did this for consistency with the create repo builder, I've made it take an org name now and not the 'apiTailUrl'.
I've kept the name as it's the only mandatory parameter for the builder
replies.author: timja

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java b/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java
index a81c13ee2..38abd0acd 100644
--- a/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java
+++ b/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHOrganization.java

@@ -450,7 +452,9 @@ public class GHOrganization extends GHPerson {
      * @return the gh team
      * @throws IOException
      *             the io exception
+     * @deprecated Use {@link #createTeam(String)} that uses a builder pattern to let you control every aspect.
      */
+    @Deprecated
     public GHTeam createTeam(String name, GHRepository... repositories) throws IOException {
         return createTeam(name, Arrays.asList(repositories));
     }

diff --git a/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHTeamBuilder.java b/src/main/java/org/kohsuke/github/GHTeamBuilder.java
